title: MUTUAL NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT

obligations.description: Maintain strict confidentiality and protect information with reasonable security measures
obligations.penalty_for_breach: Irreparable harm for which monetary damages are inadequate

obligations.description: Limit disclosure to employees/contractors with need-to-know on confidential basis
obligations.penalty_for_breach: Irreparable harm for which monetary damages are inadequate

obligations.description: Use information only for stated evaluation purposes
obligations.penalty_for_breach: Irreparable harm for which monetary damages are inadequate

obligations.description: Not reverse-engineer or attempt to derive underlying principles
obligations.penalty_for_breach: Irreparable harm for which monetary damages are inadequate

special_terms: Confidentiality Period is 3 years from disclosure date
Trade Secrets protected as long as they remain trade secrets under applicable law

conditions.exceptions: Receiving Party may disclose if required by law/court order with prior written notice to Disclosing Party

termination_conditions: Contract can be terminated upon mutual agreement
Obligations survive even after termination of discussions
